name: Dress up- ladybug fashion game
description:
= You can now make awesome Achievements based on your dress up experience!
= Try different outfit combinations to compete in fashion world.
= Share your dressing up experience from this game and let us improve it for you.

Are you ready for most amazing game for ladybug dress up and covet fashion

You have to dress up and make up well the ladybug to unlock the cat noir dress up. You have a gorgeous and in vogue collection of dresses, shirts, pants, jeans and shoes.
